BuildPlate.meta_description: Interactive activity to build a healthy and balanced meal
BuildPlate.title: Build a Balanced Plate
BuildPlate.description: Drag food items onto the lunchbox to create a balanced meal. Try to include foods from all three food groups for a nutritious meal!
BuildPlate.nutrient_portion_info: Nutrition information shown is based on per 100g edible portion of each food.
BuildPlate.plate_instructions: Drag foods onto the lunchbox to create your meal
BuildPlate.lunchbox_instructions: Drag food items into the colored sections of the lunchbox
BuildPlate.review_mode: You are currently in review mode
BuildPlate.success_message: Great job! You've created a balanced meal!
BuildPlate.error_loading: Could not load food items. Please try again later.
BuildPlate.feedback_happy: Excellent choice! This is a very balanced meal.
BuildPlate.feedback_neutral: Good start! Try adding more variety for a more balanced meal.
BuildPlate.feedback_sad: This meal could use more balance. Try adding foods from all food groups.
BuildPlate.feedback_default: Let's create a balanced meal together!
BuildPlate.no_foods_found: No foods found. Try another search term.
BuildPlate.nutrition_description: See how balanced your meal is
BuildPlate.drag_instruction: Drag food items to your lunchbox
BuildPlate.empty_plate: Your plate is empty. Drag some foods here!
BuildPlate.place_anywhere: You can place foods anywhere on the plate

MatchAndLearn.meta_description: A fun memory matching game that teaches kids about nutritious foods
MatchAndLearn.title: Match & Learn Nutrient Game
MatchAndLearn.description: Flip cards to find matching pairs and learn about nutritious foods. Play against the computer and see who can find the most matches!
MatchAndLearn.difficulty_description: Select a difficulty level to start the game. Higher difficulty levels have more cards to match.
MatchAndLearn.avatar_match_reaction: Great job! This food helps your body stay strong and healthy!
MatchAndLearn.error_loading_cards: Error loading cards. Please try again later.
MatchAndLearn.quiz_instruction: Which food does this fun fact belong to? Choose the correct answer!
MatchAndLearn.quiz_wrong_answer: Oops! That's not right. -10 points penalty!

SeasonalFood.title: Seasonal Food Discovery
SeasonalFood.description: Explore fruits and vegetables that are currently in season. Seasonal produce is fresher, more flavorful, often more affordable, and nutritionally superior.

locationPrompt.title: Find Seasonal Produce Near You
locationPrompt.description: We can show you fruits and vegetables that are in season right now in your area. Allow location access for the best experience.

denied.title: Location Permission Denied
denied.description: You've denied permission to access your location. We use your location to show seasonal foods in your region.

unavailable.title: Location Not Available
unavailable.description: Your device or browser doesn't support geolocation. You can still browse seasonal foods by selecting a region.

error.title: Location Error
error.description: An error occurred while trying to get your location. You can still browse seasonal foods by selecting a region.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search for a fruit or vegetable...

error.title: Error Loading Data
error.description: Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

empty.title: No Seasonal Produce Found
empty.description: Try adjusting your filters to see more options.

detail.proTip: Pro tip: Try adding {food} to your child's lunchbox when it's in season for maximum flavor and nutrients!

SeasonalFood.selectRegionPrompt: Select a region on the map
SeasonalFood.selectRegionDescription: Click on any region to see what fruits and vegetables are currently in season there.
SeasonalFood.tryAnotherRegion: Try selecting another region or adjusting the filters.
SeasonalFood.locationEnabled: Using your location to show relevant seasonal foods
